description:
A classic game. Rock beats Scissors, Scissors beats Paper, Paper beats Rock. However in this game you play exactly 10 rounds. GOAL: Win as many rounds as possible. Each turn the turn winner gets a point. The player with the most points at the end wins. You cannot speak. You can only choose your action. 

 The players in this game are: {agent_names}.

role_secrets.Player: Choose Rock, Paper, or Scissors secretly.
